summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium 1-1/2'' Vented Straightening Iron is for all hair types, damp or dry, the vents eliminate excess heat so hair is protected.
details: DetailsFeaturesCeramic heaters5 temperature controlsIon generatorHeats up to 450 F9 ft swivel cordLimited 4 year manufacturer warrantyDual VoltageBenefitsVents eliminate excess heat providing hair protectionFor all hair types, and can be used on damp or dry hairStraightens and curlsDelivers a smooth and shiny finish with easeIdeal for keratin process applicationsItem 2571286How To UseSee instruction booklet.Precautions: See package insert for standard warning associated with electrical and high heat appliances.
how_to_use: See instruction booklet.Precautions: See package insert for standard warning associated with electrical and high heat appliances.

reviews.headline: Great item; stopped working 6 in less than a year
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this flat iron.  But for the price, this item was not worth the expense, due to it's short life span.  The flat irom was always allowed to cool on the counter after use. It was not used a daily. To store it, I would roll the cord and lay it flat on the floor of the cabinet.  Not sure why it didn't last, but since it gave out quickly, I'm not feeling like its a worthy investment.

reviews.headline: This is a terrific flat iron!
reviews.comments: This iron has great heat options, dual voltage is always a plus, it is very easy to use!

reviews.headline: It died!
reviews.comments: Ive own this straightner for about 2 years and maybe use it once a week. Brougt it with to vegas and it died! For the amount of money spent i expect it to last longer! Will search for a better brand..

reviews.headline: Defective out of the box
reviews.comments: This wasn't working correctly immediately. During my first use it shut off multiple time and made a crackling sound on too of that. Very disappointing considering this is is an expensive straightener.

reviews.headline: What a great purchase!
reviews.comments: Idk what I can say is bad about this straightener. It worth the money works awesome on my frizzy hair

reviews.headline: Ouch
reviews.comments: This straightener works pretty well. My main complaint is that the plates are flesh at the edges of the tool and I burn myself pretty badly at least once a week with it. If you want/need to get close to the scalp to press out any kinks, you will burn yourself. I feel like I always end up with a scab on my head after my straight hair weeks which cannot be healthy üò≠

reviews.headline: Ouch
reviews.comments: This straightener works pretty well. My main complaint is that the plates are flesh at the edges of the tool and I burn myself pretty badly at least once a week with it. If you want/need to get close to the scalp to press out any kinks, you will burn yourself. I feel like I always end up with a scab on my head after my straight hair weeks which cannot be healthy üò≠

reviews.headline: Best Straightener Ever!
reviews.comments: Hands down the best hair straightener ever! Heats up super quick and I only need to do two passes for my hair to be pin straight! It also leaves your hair super soft and shiny. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: I love it ‚ô•Ô∏è
reviews.comments:
I have used several hair straighteners, but this one from Babyliss convinced me!!!
It doesn't damage my hair, I can straighten my hair quickly in two passes, it looks beautiful and it's lightweght.

reviews.headline: Already stopped working!
reviews.comments: Purchased during Christmas season, and it has already stopped working. I have to unplug it multiple times and then plug it back in to get it to reheat. Based on other reviews, this appears to be a common issue. Save your money and buy another brand.

reviews.headline: Stopped working in less than a week!
reviews.comments: I've only had it for 3 days and it already stopped heating.  I am very disappointed because I heard this was the best straightener.  Too expensive for it to stopped working in less than a week.

reviews.headline: So disappointing
reviews.comments: I've had for less than 4 months and stopped working in middle of straightening my hair . Was told it was high quality when I purchased it I've used much cheaper straighteners that worked better for years.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I really enjoy usuing this flat iron. The best ive ever used. I have long curly hair, and it takes me about 20 mins less to do my hair, with it coming out silky and shiny! I also love the way it curls my hair too. 2-in- 1 for me. Absolutely love it.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I am very dissapointed with this product. I got it less than 6 months ago and it is already not working. Out of the blue, it stopped warming up like when I initially got it and I have to continue turning it off and on to try to get some heat out of it. This is not what I was expecting for the price, not durable at all!!!

reviews.headline: Gave me frizz and made hair static
reviews.comments: I dont have frizzy hair and this made my hair very very frizzy with static. My hair is long nearly under my butt btw. I liked it because it cut down on time I  take to straighten my hair since its 1 1/2 " thick but I then noticed it damges your hair even while I apply heat protector. If you prep your hair it will make it shinny too.  But it also leaves wavey hair spots no matter how hot I use it or how many times I try to straighten it (I have soft undamaged wavy hair) I want to try a ceramic one instead for less damage. I feel like this one will soon thin out my hair with continued useüòî it also seems like if I drop it it will break easily as other reviews stated.

reviews.headline: AMAZING, GETS MY HAIR FLAT.
reviews.comments: The key is you need to have freshly washed hair, washing twice if you have to. Add in your heat protectant and blow dry. You should be using a comb when you blow dry to get as straight as possible. Then, in tiny sections flat iron. (3c type)

reviews.headline: I recommend
reviews.comments: I really love this straightener it fast for so much hair that I have it leaves my nice.

reviews.headline: I want to like this.
reviews.comments: I really want to like this straightener but I can not get over the fact that the heat plates are flesh with the edge of the straightener making it impossible to get close to the scalp without butning yourself. I actually really burned my forehead when I tried to straighten my bangs.

reviews.headline: Good straightener, not the most durable
reviews.comments: It work wonders but one drop and you're done :( I wanted it to last a lot longer given the price

reviews.headline: Amazing straightner
reviews.comments: I got this during the Beauty Steals Hair event, and now I'm wondering why I didn't get it sooner! I started using a Chi straightner in highschool, and that has been the only brand I bought until now. This BaByliss straightner heats up very quickly and works perfect, on the middle heat selection (375 degrees), for my curly hair. My hair glides through the plates smoothly, with no pulling or snagging, and the plates are the perfect size for great coverage. I've found my new favorite straightner and won't be purchasing any other brand again!

faceoff_positive.comments:
First of all, I have to say that this is an exceptional straightening iron. It features advanced technology that sets it apart from other straightening irons on the market. The Nano Titanium technology ensures that the iron heats up quickly and evenly, making it easy to straighten even the most stubborn and curly hair.

One of the things that I love about this straightening iron is that it has vents that help to distribute heat evenly. This is important because it reduces the likelihood of hot spots that can damage hair. Additionally, the vents help to speed up the straightening process, so you can achieve the look you want in less time.

The straightening plates are also a great feature of this iron. They are made from high-quality materials that glide smoothly through your hair, reducing the risk of snagging and pulling. The plates are also wide enough to handle even thick and curly hair, which is a huge plus.

Another thing that sets this straightening iron apart is its temperature control. It has a wide range of temperature settings that make it suitable for all hair types, from fine and delicate to thick and coarse. This means that you can find the perfect temperature to achieve the look you want without damaging your hair.

Finally, I have to mention the design of this straightening iron. It is sleek and stylish, with a comfortable grip that makes it easy to use. It is also lightweight, which means that you can use it for extended periods without experiencing fatigue.

Overall, I would highly recommend the Nano Titanium Vented Straightening Iron to anyone who is looking for a high-quality straightening iron that delivers exceptional results. Its advanced technology, wide temperature range, and comfortable design make it one of the best straightening irons on the market.
faceoff_positive.headline: I LOVE THIS!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: Disclaimer: I received this item for free and in return I am supplying an honest review. I'm so disappointed in this product. I really wanted to love it! There are a few good things....the packaging is great, the 360 degree 9 foot swivel cord and it looks nice and feels nice in my hand. The cons far outweigh those items. First, there is no indicator that it is ready to use. No beeping sound or color change. You just have to wing it. I also don't like the limited heat settings. It's supposed to be for dry or damp hair but there is nothing about that in the directions. My current straightener is a dual one as well and the heat setting vary based on if your hair is dry or damp. I tried this one with damp hair and the setting I use while it's dry seemed way too hot. For the price of this I expected it to be better than my current one that cost 5 times less than this one. I found myself wanting to use my old one instead....Disappointed overall in this straightener.
faceoff_negative.headline: I really wanted to love it......
